decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing various control spells and enchantments to disrupt and stall the opponent's gameplay while setting up for powerful creatures like Zur, Eternal Schemer and the Overlords. By maintaining board control and limiting the opponent's resources, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent until it can overwhelm them with its big threats. The land base is designed to provide flexibility in mana production while also offering some utility in the form of different types of lands.

This Jeskai Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with aggressive creatures like Marauding Mako and Steamcore Scholar. These creatures are supported by cards like Fear of Missing Out and Torch the Tower to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The deck also includes some control elements with cards like Spell Pierce and Abrade to help deal with opposing threats. The mix of aggro and control elements allows this deck to maintain pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively control the board with a mix of removal spells, disruptive creatures, and evasion tactics. By using cards like Enduring Curiosity and Spyglass Siren to draw cards and maintain card advantage, while also utilizing powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to dominate the battlefield, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory. By efficiently using mana resources and managing the tempo of the game, the deck seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in a fast-paced, aggressive playstyle.
